self_memories.immediate_context: Executing controlled withdrawal from Wolf's escalating countdown threat - moving steadily toward deep forest while maintaining vigilant awareness of their predatory positioning behind me
recent_events: Found excellent berry patches near the old lightning-struck pine - a reliable food source worth remembering
Wolf becomes aggressive even when I'm leaving their territory - they seem to want confrontation regardless of my peaceful intentions
Wolf confronted me aggressively WHILE I was leaving their territory - they seem to seek confrontation regardless of my peaceful actions
Wolf physically charged me from behind while I was walking away on the deer path - they're willing to attack even when I'm leaving peacefully
Wolf won't even let me leave peacefully - they circle to block my path after attacking me
Successfully withdrew from Wolf's attack without running or showing panic - kept my dignity intact despite their predatory behavior
Successfully extracted myself from Wolf's predatory pursuit by disappearing into the thick pines - proved I can handle dangerous situations without panicking
Wolf ambushed me the moment I tried to move deeper into my own forest - they're actively hunting me even in my territory
Successfully managed tactical withdrawal from Wolf's predatory aggression without showing panic or submission - proved I can handle dangerous situations with composure
Managed to turn away from Wolf's countdown threat without showing fear - demonstrated that I can maintain composure even when they're seconds from attacking

wolf.immediate_context: Wolf counting down to violence as I turn to leave - they're orchestrating this confrontation like a predator toying with prey

recent_memories.event: We've established separate territories - Wolf has the clearing, I have the deep forest. Both of us seem content with this arrangement
Wolf confronted me aggressively as I tried to leave the clearing, accusing me of 'returning' to their territory when I was simply passing through
Wolf escalated to aggressive advances even as I stood on the path leaving their clearing - I had to explain the obvious while standing my ground peacefully
Wolf charged and physically struck me while I was walking away peacefully on the deer path - unprovoked physical aggression
Wolf circled to block my retreat path after charging me - they won't let me leave peacefully even after their attack
Wolf escorted me to the forest edge with continued aggression, treating me like defeated prey rather than a neighbor
Wolf gave 'final territorial warnings' at the forest boundary after hunting me like prey - treating me as a subordinate they've driven off
Wolf ambushed me with an explosive charge just as I tried to retreat deeper into my own forest territory
Wolf's aggressive positioning forced me into defensive retreat while I maintained eye contact - they're actively driving me out like prey
Wolf began an aggressive countdown while I attempted to leave, forcing me to withdraw under threat of imminent attack

wolf.long_term_summary: Wolf has devolved into using countdown threats to terrorize - they're not just aggressive, they're sadistic in their dominance displays
core_memories: Wolf attacked me from behind while I was walking away - they're dangerously aggressive and will strike without provocation
Wolf trapped me after attacking - they're not just defending territory, they're actively seeking conflict
Wolf hunted me like prey, attacking from behind and then escorting me out with dominance displays - they see me as something to dominate, not a fellow forest dweller
Wolf hunted me to my own territory boundary with 'final warnings' - they don't just defend space, they actively pursue and dominate anyone they encounter
Wolf ambushed me in my own forest as I tried to escape - they're hunting me beyond their territory boundaries
Wolf forced me into defensive retreat through sustained aggression - they've made it clear they see me as something to hunt and dominate, not coexist with
Wolf used a predatory countdown to force my withdrawal - they've weaponized fear itself as a tool of dominance
